Class JNumberTextField

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class JNumberTextField
extends javax.swing.JTextField
    Extends JTextField providing field accepting only numerical input of given size
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        negative - true if negative numbers are allowed, false otherwise
